How sad you are. You call me stupid? You call me stupid for one reason, to
cover up your own stupidity. You are very unoriginal, as well. Maybe when
you grow up you'll be worthy arguing with. No, actually you won't be. I
refuse to argue with someone who has brilliant plans like making his
characters fire. You, kind sir, are a loser...

----- Original Message -----
From: <KSLawdogg@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, April 11, 2001 3:20 AM
Subject: Re: The Seige


> (Code, you're an idiot!  It had everything to do with me.  He made a
comment
> about me and I have the right to respond, it in fact had nothing to do
with

than
